pr_title: Constrain unique version names for workflow versions plus tags

timeline.message:
Locally working db changes

* addresses duplicate workflow versions
* no way to not touch tags at the same time due to inheritance
* will need to test well for side-effects
* particularly refresh/upsert/etc
Remove constraint for version due to inheritance
Delete less content in migration due to services
Some patches for edge cases, probably need more

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand the need for this -- on line 214 you've already verified that the map does not contain the name. How could the map now contain the name? Can line 221/223 change the name? Otherwise this seems redundant. Or I'm missing something.
timeline.author: coverbeck

replies.bodyText: I think it should be redundant, I probably had something else in mind.
replies.author: denis-yuen
